canceljobrun.name: CancelJobRun
canceljobrun.description: Grants permission to cancel a job run

createjobtemplate.name: CreateJobTemplate
createjobtemplate.description: Grants permission to create a job template

createmanagedendpoint.description: Grants permission to create a managed endpoint

createsecurityconfiguration.name: CreateSecurityConfiguration
createsecurityconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a security configuration

createvirtualcluster.name: CreateVirtualCluster
createvirtualcluster.description: Grants permission to create a virtual cluster

deletejobtemplate.name: DeleteJobTemplate
deletejobtemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a job template

deletemanagedendpoint.name: DeleteManagedEndpoint
deletemanagedendpoint.description: Grants permission to delete a managed endpoint

deletevirtualcluster.name: DeleteVirtualCluster
deletevirtualcluster.description: Grants permission to delete a virtual cluster

describejobrun.name: DescribeJobRun
describejobrun.description: Grants permission to describe a job run

describejobtemplate.name: DescribeJobTemplate
describejobtemplate.description: Grants permission to describe a job template

describemanagedendpoint.name: DescribeManagedEndpoint
describemanagedendpoint.description: Grants permission to describe a managed endpoint

describesecurityconfiguration.name: DescribeSecurityConfiguration
describesecurityconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe a security configuration

describevirtualcluster.name: DescribeVirtualCluster
describevirtualcluster.description: Grants permission to describe a virtual cluster

getmanagedendpointsessioncredentials.name: GetManagedEndpointSessionCredentials
getmanagedendpointsessioncredentials.description: Grants permission to generate a session token used to connect to a managed endpoint

listjobruns.name: ListJobRuns
listjobruns.description: Grants permission to list job runs associated with a virtual cluster

listjobtemplates.name: ListJobTemplates
listjobtemplates.description: Grants permission to list job templates

listmanagedendpoints.name: ListManagedEndpoints
listmanagedendpoints.description: Grants permission to list managed endpoints associated with a virtual cluster

listsecurityconfigurations.name: ListSecurityConfigurations
listsecurityconfigurations.description: Grants permission to list security configurations

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for the specified resource

listvirtualclusters.name: ListVirtualClusters
listvirtualclusters.description: Grants permission to list virtual clusters

startjobrun.name: StartJobRun
startjobrun.description: Grants permission to start a job run

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified resource
